summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of HI AI-APP.COM PWA features completed. All 9 test features passed successfully. Landing page loads with proper branding, multi-language support works with all 5 Indian languages, persona cards are swipeable, D-COIN branding is consistent across all pages, and PWA manifest is accessible.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with HI AI-APP.COM branding and animated elements
Language selector dropdown shows all 5 languages (English, Hindi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu)
Language switching updates UI text to selected language (Hindi shows 'क्या AI मेरी जगह लेगा?')
Swipeable persona cards work (Candidate, Consumer, Corporate) with left/right navigation and dot indicators
D-COIN branding is consistent (not E-COIN) across Landing, Dashboard, Wallet, Gigs, Clubs pages
8 Super App Icons grid is clickable and navigates to correct routes (Agent AIMEE, DoersID, Role Play, Jobs4Me, World Wheel, D-COIN, 5 Clubs, Dream SIIP)
Astro Doer mascot appears in bottom-right corner after 2 seconds with streak badge
PWA manifest.json is accessible at /manifest.json with proper HI AI-APP.COM configuration
5 Wheels Engine animation is visible with all 5 wheel labels (Learn, Earn, Live, Work Wheel, World Wheel)
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - LanguageProvider properly wraps the app
Framer-motion animations are well implemented with proper transitions
data-testid attributes are present on key interactive elements
i18n translations are comprehensive for all 5 languages
test_credentials: For authenticated pages: any phone number except 9876543210 with OTP from API response
seed_data_creation: Used localStorage mock for authenticated page testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: PWA features fully tested. All 9 features from the test request are working correctly. D-COIN rebranding is complete across all pages. Multi-language i18n with 5 Indian languages is functional. Astro Doer mascot appears after 2 seconds. Persona card swiping works with framer-motion animations. Backend APIs are MOCKED as noted in the test request.
mocked_apis_note: Backend APIs (auth/otp, jobs, applications) are MOCKED in server.py - test focus was frontend PWA features only
